text:
Rajasthan University Students Union is the union of students at University of Rajasthan. It is generally abbreviated as RUSU.
Elections.
Every year RUSU conducts elections for the office bearers. Indian National Congress supported NSUI and Bhartiya Janta Party supported ABVP are major groups.
RUSU 2010 - 2011.
Former ABVP National Secretary and now young Congress leader Manish Yadav won the 2010-11 RUSU presidential seat.
